column4: Outer loop New Circle Rd at Georgetown Rd
column5: Four vehicles reportedly involved.  At least one lane is blocked.
The right lane remains blocked following a vehicle fire.

column4: Starting Monday 5/10 on W Short St at N Mill St and N Upper St.
Signals will be flashing red All-Way stops from 7 p.m. to 7 a.m. each evening.
Signals will be normal Red-Yellow-Green at all other times.
